statement: Density rules are reversible surface abbreviations. They MUST expand to canonical HLX/HLXL before lowering, encoding, or hashing. Density is never authoritative for LC-B/LC_12.
terminology_note: LS = Latent Space ONLY. HLX/HLXL are surface tracks. LC-R is runic LC display form.

rules.validation: ADVISORY - parser MAY enforce if contract metadata available; MUST NOT reject if metadata unavailable.

rules.note: ASCII digits 0-9 map to Unicode subscripts when displayed in runic form

invariants.reversibility: All density transformations MUST be perfectly reversible
invariants.canonical_expansion: Density forms MUST expand BEFORE: (a) lowering, (b) LC-B encoding, (c) hashing, (d) LC_12 envelope construction
invariants.transport_authority: Density is NEVER authoritative for transport integrity - only expanded canonical form is
